net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: basicToon = dndb_getBasicToon ()]
[h: senses = json.get (basicToon, "senses")] [h: senseStr = ""] [h, foreach (sense, senses), code: { [h: senseName = json.get (sense, "name")] [h: distance = json.get (sense, "distance")] [h, if (distance > 0): senseStr = senseStr + ", " + senseName + " " + distance; ""] <!-- Currently, the only Sight Type to apply is Darkvision --> [h, if (senseName == "Darkvision"): setSightType ("Darkvision"); ""] }] [h, if (senseStr == ""): senseStr = "Normal"; senseStr = substring (senseStr, 2)] [h: setProperty ("Senses", senseStr)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_applyVision
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: Applies the vision to the token based on the BasicToon senses
